mr. Hodge: Mr. Hodge is the teacher and instructor of the Audio and Visual Class. He makes sure that the students do amazing in class and that they can be the best they can be in the studio while producing Wolf TV.

michael: Michael is a cameramen who goes out and helps fetch footage for stories. Without footage, Wolf TV wouldn't be a thing.

max: The main editor of the team. Max lives up to his role by editing stories and other films with Adobe Premiere Pro.

mark: Like Max, Mark is also an editor. He helps edit the announcements, and is the talent of Cyber News. Mark also developed the site you're currently viewing right now.

madison: Madison is a member who writes out the scripts for announcements, and for other segments of the show. Her work helps develop segments, piece together announcements, and allow questions to be asked for people being interviewed.

lex: Lex is also an edtior, but not just an editor, but also the director of Cyber News. Lex makes sure that the segment is produced well, and even does all the editing for the segment as well!

josh Styles: Josh Styles is the graphic designer of the team. He creates amazing images and designs not only for Wolf TV, but for other parts of the school as well.

josh Ellis: Josh Ellis is another editor on the team. He is apart of the segment 'Retro Review' and is the editor for the segment.

ethan: Ethan is the talent of the announcements. He gets the job done by simply following along on the scripts. You get to see him in action when Wolf TV episodes come out!

eli: Eli is the director of Wolf TV. He makes sure that everything is doing well, making sure content is being made, while also still having a good time.

diego: Like Michael, Diego is also a cameraman with the same tasks: Collect footage for stories, interviews, and other films. He is also the talent for Retro Review.

christian: Like Ethan, Christian is also a talent of the announcements. He gets the job done by doing the same thing as Ethan: reading the script! You also get to see him in action!

michael: Michael is a cameramen who goes out and helps fetch footage for stories. Without footage, Wolf TV wouldn't be a thing.

matthew: Matthew does a lot of things at Wolf TV! He does the editing for Cyber News & Pop Trivia, occasionally a cameraman, and even the HOST for Cyber News.

christian: Christian is now apart of the editing team at Wolf TV! He now edits stories and the announcements with Mark.
